review: I did not expect to like this game. I checked the screenshots, and thought 'this doesn't look like a game I would enjoy'.I was very wrong.This is a very fun, intense murder spree. The music is great, the gameplay is very fun. It does take some practice to get going, but it definately worthwhile. I will be buying the sequel as soon it is released!Also, for those of you on steamboxes or linux, it runs great natively on linux!
Fun platformer game. Works well with controller in big screen mode.
